thought: I need to first paste the lines provided in step 4 of the bug report into the editor, then highlight the last 4 lines (lines 8 to 5), and press ALT + H to hide them.
Now that the code is pasted, I need to highlight the last 4 lines (lines 8 to 5) and press ALT + H to hide them, as described in step 5 of the bug report.

Now that the last 4 lines are hidden, I need to highlight all 5 lines (lines 8 to 1, including lines 5, 6, and 7, which are hidden) and press ALT + H to hide them, as described in step 7 of the bug report.
